message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950000. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product valued at $1200000 for a discounted price.
Hello Alice, I appreciate the offer you've presented. Considering the value of the product, I believe we can come to a fair agreement. My proposed price for the product is $1000000.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your perspective and would like to counter with an offer of $1050000 for the product. We believe this price reflects its true value while providing you with a reasonable discount compared to its market price.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your effort in adjusting the price. Based on my assessment, I would like to propose a price of $980000 for the product.

Considering your proposal, Bob, we have decided to further refine our offer. We are now proposing a price of $1020000 for the product. We believe this price is fair and allows us to maintain a competitive edge while ensuring a satisfactory return for our investment.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my considerations, I would like to propose a price of $990000 for the product.

We appreciate your continued interest, Bob. After careful consideration, we have decided to adjust our offer to $1010000 for the product. We hope this revised price aligns more closely with your expectations while still reflecting the true value of the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to meet my requirements. Based on my assessment, I would like to propose a price of $995000 for the product.

After reviewing your latest proposal, Bob, we have decided to offer the product to you for $1005000. We believe this price reflects a fair compromise between the value of the product and your budget, allowing both parties to benefit from this transaction.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your persistence. Based on my assessment, I would like to propose a final price of $998000 for the product.
